name: Star Trek: Starfleet Command III

files.latest_patch: N/A: Select the latest patch setup.exe

content:
files:
- latest_patch: 'N/A: Select the latest patch setup.exe'
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Activision/Sfc3/SFC3.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: Setup.exe
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: $DISC/Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: latest_patch
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts d3dx9 d3dcompiler_43 dinput8
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
